sentences.en: I confess the inhumanity of this action moved me very much, and made me relent exceedingly.
sentences.cn: 我自认这种不人道的举动使我很痛心, 我非常怜悯她.

sentences.en: It's more about sadness and loneliness than about cruelty or inhumanity.
sentences.cn: 本片讲述较多的是悲伤和孤独,而不是残酷和残暴.

sentences.en: John Bul Dau explores territory few can imagine — the depths of inhumanity and the boundaries of endurance.
sentences.cn: 常人根本无法想象约翰·布尔·道所探索的是怎样的领域:非人程度之深与忍耐程度之极.

sentences.en: The hardness and inhumanity of the man was fast breaking up.
sentences.cn: 这人那冷酷无情的心情很快地消灭了.

sentences.en: The illegality is quite equal to the inhumanity.
sentences.cn: 其不合法与不人道是不相上下的.

sentences.en: the inhumanity of some political systems
sentences.cn: 某些政治制度的不人道

sentences.en: The worst sin towards our fellow creatures is not to hate them: that's the essence of inhumanity.
sentences.cn: 对待他人的最大罪恶不是“狠”,而是“冷漠”, “ 冷漠”才是不人道的本质.
